T08D4119-2:39b-36: ba gcig pa nyid kyis nye bar brtags pa la
T08D4119-2:39b-37: stan las langs nas yang dang yang du za ba
T08D4119-2:39b-39: lto 'dun las gyur pa'i ltung byed do //
T08D4119-2:39b-40: gang la tshogs par dbyung ba ma yin pa'i dri bstan pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
T08D4119-2:39b-41: de'i phyir sgog skya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
T08D4119-2:39b-42: za ba la'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T08D4119-2:40a-0: de dag ci tsam la yang rung ste zhes bya ba bye brag @40a * //
T08D4119-2:40a-1: ma smos pas rtogs par bya'o //
T08D4119-2:40a-2: na ba'i phyir ni ltung ba med do //
T08D4119-2:40a-3: btsong dang sgog skya dag la bye brag smos pas
T08D4119-2:40a-4: ji ltar thob pa'i nyes byas su rig par bya'o
T08D4119-2:40a-5: // kun dong ke'u dag za ba la ni dri chung ba'i phyir nyes byas so //
T08D4119-2:40a-6: tshogs par dbyung ba ma yin pa'i dri bstan pa'i ltung byed do /
T08D4119-2:40a-8: // / da 'di man chad du ni bsu bel ba las gyur pa'i ltung byed gsum ston te /
T08D4119-2:40a-9: de rnams kyi dang po bstan pa de'i phyir /
T08D4119-2:40a-10: rmig ba mi 'chang ba la'o zhes smos te /
T08D4119-2:40a-11: longs spyod par byed pa snang du rung ba'i gos
T08D4119-2:40a-12: ngan pa mi 'dog pa bsal ba'i phyir 'di yin
T08D4119-2:40a-13: te / bsu bel ba zhes bya ba ni gos
T08D4119-2:40a-14: ma rungs par gyur pa de gzhan dag gis tshor
T08D4119-2:40a-15: te / ba la bya'o // de bas na de
T08D4119-2:40a-16: lta bur gyur pa'i lus 'og ma'i gos spang par
T08D4119-2:40a-17: bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T08D4119-2:40a-18: ji ltar brjod pa'i nyes pa yongs su spang ba'i don du rmeg pa bcang bar bya'o //
T08D4119-2:40a-19: skye gnas kyi sgor 'di ma brtags pa nyid la ltung byed do //
T08D4119-2:40a-20: de thig gus btags te bzhag go zhes bya ba la /
T08D4119-2:40a-21: de zhes bya ba ni rme gab de'o //
T08D4119-2:40a-22: mdo de gnyis kyi lung ni phran tshogs dag las
T08D4119-2:40a-23: kha bsgyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs
T08D4119-2:40a-24: pa yin no // de dus dus su bkru ba dang kha bsgyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T08D4119-2:40a-25: rmeg ba de zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T08D4119-2:40a-26: gang la bslab pa'i gzhi gnyis pa de brngod par bya ste /
T08D4119-2:40a-27: chu gos kyang ngo zhes bya ba la /
T08D4119-2:40a-28: kyang gi sgra ni mi 'chang ba la'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T08D4119-2:40a-29: gang gi tsho lus gsher bar gyur pa de'i tsho /
T08D4119-2:40a-30: gang gis chu gos mi 'chang mi gon zhing de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T08D4119-2:40a-31: mdoms kyi spu man chad nas /
T08D4119-2:40a-32: pus mo'i lhang nga yan chad kyi phyogs mi 'gebs pa la dngos gzhi'o //
T08D4119-2:40a-33: gzhan gnya' ba man chad nas long bu yan chad
T08D4119-2:40a-34: kyi lus mgrin pa'i bar du lus kyi phyogs mi
T08D4119-2:40a-35: 'gebs pa la ni nyes byas so //
T08D4119-2:40a-36: 'dir gleng gzhi las dge slong ma rab tu mang
T08D4119-2:40a-37: po dag bud med khyim pa mo dag dang lhan
T08D4119-2:40a-38: cig tu chu klung gnas can gyi nang du khrus
T08D4119-2:40a-39: byed cing de dag khrus byed pa na bud med
T08D4119-2:40a-40: dag mdzub mos ston cing rab tu byung ba mo
T08D4119-2:40a-41: che ge mo dag gi nu ma gnyis ni 'di
T08D4119-2:40a-42: 'dra'o // che ge mo zhig gi lto ba ni spyang khyi 'dra'o//
T08D4119-2:40b-0: @40b che ge mo zhig gi rked pa ni sbom mo //
T08D4119-2:40b-1: che ge mo zhig gi brla ni glang po che'i
T08D4119-2:40b-2: sna 'dra'o zhes lus kyi yan lag dang gsang ba'i
T08D4119-2:40b-3: phyogs dag gi brjod pa rnam pa mang pos bsnyad
T08D4119-2:40b-4: 'dogs pa las 'di bcas pa yin no //
T08D4119-2:40b-5: 'dis ni ro stod ma g-yogs pa'i kha na ma
T08D4119-2:40b-6: tho ba nyid du shes par bya ste zhes bya
T08D4119-2:40b-8: chu gos dang khrus ras zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par 'byed pa las so //
T08D4119-2:40b-9: chu gos 'di dus thams cad du phyi rol pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T08D4119-2:40b-10: de'i phyir dge slong ma rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen ma gsungs te /
T08D4119-2:40b-11: de nyid kyis chog pa'i phyir ro //
T08D4119-2:40b-12: de gnyis bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rmeg pa dang chu gos dag go //
T08D4119-2:40b-13: rang nyid kyang nye bar gnas pa bca' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir bcang bar bya'o //
T08D4119-2:40b-14: gang la rmig pa 'chang bar gtogs pa'i ltung byed gsum par 'gyur ba de brjod par bya'o //
T08D4119-2:40b-15: de'i phyir bkur bshal ba la gos 'khrur 'jug pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
T08D4119-2:40b-16: rang gi gos byin gyis brlabs pa rnying pa bkru
T08D4119-2:40b-17: bar 'os pa chos gos dang gding ba dag bkru
T08D4119-2:40b-18: bshal ba la 'khrur 'jug pa la zhes bya ba
T08D4119-2:40b-19: 'dis ni 'di'i bye brag zhib tu ni 'khrur 'jug
T08D4119-2:40b-20: pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi rjes su 'brangs nas
T08D4119-2:40b-21: shes par bya'o // gang gi phyir kha na ma tho ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T08D4119-2:40b-22: de dang 'dra ba'i nyes dmigs la ni bcas pa'o //
T08D4119-2:40b-24: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag rmi lam na
T08D4119-2:40b-25: gnod pa mthong bas mi gtsang bas gos dag la
T08D4119-2:40b-26: gos par gyur nas bkru bshal ba la 'khrur 'jug
T08D4119-2:40b-27: pa dang / bkru bshal ba dag gis blangs te /
T08D4119-2:40b-28: khyim pa'i gos dag dang lhan cig bkrus pas na /
T08D4119-2:40b-29: de dag gis 'bags pa khyim pa'i gos dkar po
T08D4119-2:40b-30: dag mi gtsang bas ma rungs par gyur pa dang
T08D4119-2:40b-31: / khyim pa rnams kyis bkru bshal ba la bdag
T08D4119-2:40b-32: cag gi gos gang gis 'bags zhes zer zhing dris
T08D4119-2:40b-34: dge slong ma rnams kyi gos bdag gis bkru ba'i phyir blangs te /
T08D4119-2:40b-35: de dang 'brel pas 'di rnams 'bags pa yin no
T08D4119-2:40b-36: zhes de skad ces zer ba de thos pas khyim
T08D4119-2:40b-37: pa rnams 'phya zhing rab tu byung bar dag ni
T08D4119-2:40b-38: nye bar ma zhi'o zhes zer ba'i bar las bcas
T08D4119-2:41a-1: bkrus na yang bkrus pa nyid yin no //
T08D4119-2:41a-2: byas pa nyid la byed du bcug pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T08D4119-2:41a-3: 'bras bu'i mtha' tshun chad gcig nyid do //
T08D4119-2:41a-4: bshang ba dang gcig ba dang /
T08D4119-2:41a-5: ljan ljin dang 'dam rdzab la sogs pas ma rungs
T08D4119-2:41a-6: pa 'khrur bcug pa la yang na smad pa med
T08D4119-2:41a-7: do zhes sngar bstan pa dag kyang 'dir de bzhin
T08D4119-2:41a-9: 'dir gos kha bsgyur ba dang ma bsgyur ba btso
T08D4119-2:41a-10: blag mkhan la kha bsgyur du bcug pa ni ji
T08D4119-2:41a-11: ltar thob pa las nyes byas su rig par bya'o
T08D4119-2:41a-12: // bsu bel ba las gyur pa'i ltung byed gsum mo /
T08D4119-2:41a-14: // / gang la chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mi gus pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
T08D4119-2:41a-15: de'i phyir dge sbyong gi gos khyim pa la bgo
T08D4119-2:41a-16: ba'i phyir sbyin pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te
T08D4119-2:41a-17: / tshad dang ldan pa'i gos rnam sbyar dang bla
T08D4119-2:41a-18: gos la sogs pa khyim pa la bgo zhing bskon
T08D4119-2:41a-19: pa'i phyir sbyin pa la zhes bya ba'i don to
T08D4119-2:41a-20: / // 'dir mdo las byin na zhes gsungs pa de'i rnam par 'byed pa ni //
T08D4119-2:41a-21: bgo bar byed cing bskon par byed na zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T08D4119-2:41a-22: bskon pa la nges par sbyor bar 'gyur bas sbyin
T08D4119-2:41a-23: par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni don la rnam par
T08D4119-2:41a-25: tshad ni 'khor gsum khebs pa'i mthar thug pa yan chad la ltung byed do //
T08D4119-2:41a-26: khru gang yan chad la ni nyes byas so //
T08D4119-2:41a-27: de bas na chung ba gzhan la ni ltung ba
T08D4119-2:41a-28: med do zhes bya ba 'dir rnam par gzhag pa
T08D4119-2:41a-29: rig pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T08D4119-2:41a-30: gang zhig bsrung ba'i don du byis pa dag la mgrin par gos btags te /
T08D4119-2:41a-31: cha lugs bsgyur ba'am zhes bya ba smos pas ltung
T08D4119-2:41a-32: ba bskyed pa'i tshad dang ldan pa la yang der
T08D4119-2:41a-33: nyes pa med par rig par bya'o //
T08D4119-2:41a-34: de yang rab tu byung ba'i phyogs la gzhag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
T08D4119-2:41a-35: chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mi gus pa'i ltung byed do //
T08D4119-2:41a-36: gang lci ba'i chos las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyogs
T08D4119-2:41a-37: dang mnyam par byed par gyur pas rang gi phyogs
T08D4119-2:41a-38: kyis lci ba'i phyogs la rgyal mtshan brje ba'i ltung
T08D4119-2:41a-40: de'i phyir dge slong dang lhan cig snam sbyar brje ba la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
T08D4119-2:41a-41: chos gos chen po nyid kyi phyir ro //
T08D4119-2:41b-0: de bas na kha na ma tho ba 'di skyed @41b pa'o ;
T08D4119-2:41b-1: /'dir gzhan las len yang kha na ma tho ba
T08D4119-2:41b-2: 'dir 'gyur gyi sbyin pa la ni ma yin no
T08D4119-2:41b-3: // de lta bas na bzang ngan brje ba ma
T08D4119-2:41b-4: gtogs par dge slong la snam sbyar len pa la
T08D4119-2:41b-5: ltung byed 'di rnam par gzhag pa kho na'o //
T08D4119-2:41b-6: brje ba zhes bya ba ni len pa'i dpe tsam du zad do //
T08D4119-2:41b-7: rgyal mtshan pa rje ba'i ltung byed do /
T08D4119-2:41b-9: // / da 'di man chad ser sna byed pa'i ltung byed lnga ston te /
T08D4119-2:41b-10: gang la de rnams kyi dang por 'gyur zhe na /
T08D4119-2:41b-11: de'i phyir bsngags pa la ser sna byed pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
T08D4119-2:41b-12: dge slong ma gzhan dag gi bsngags pa brjod pa
T08D4119-2:41b-13: la ser nas byed par 'gyur ba la ltung byed
T08D4119-2:41b-15: gang la ltung byed bzhi por 'gyur zhe na /
T08D4119-2:41b-16: de brjod par bya ste khyim dang /
T08D4119-2:41b-18: rnyed pa dang chos la ser sna byed pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
T08D4119-2:41b-19: la'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'dir khyim la sogs
T08D4119-2:41b-20: pa re re la ser sna byed pa la'o zhes
T08D4119-2:41b-22: sdom par byed pa thams cad la nyes byas nyid
T08D4119-2:41b-23: de bsdam par bya ba thams cad kyang yid kyi
T08D4119-2:41b-24: ltung ba thams cad la zhes bya bar rnam par
T08D4119-2:41b-25: gzhag pa'o // 'dir yid tsam gyi ser sna byed
T08D4119-2:41b-26: pa na bsdam par bya ba nyid yin te nyes
T08D4119-2:41b-27: gzhag pa'o // byas so // de bas na 'dir
T08D4119-2:41b-28: gzhan la bsngags pa la sogs pa lhag par spyod
T08D4119-2:41b-29: pa'i gnyen por gyur pa na lus dag la ser
T08D4119-2:41b-30: sna'i dbang gis bsngags pa la sogs pa'i gegs su
T08D4119-2:41b-31: gyur pa nyid kyis bsngags pa la sogs pa'i ser
T08D4119-2:41b-32: sna'i sgra smos pa yin gyi ser sna'i dri ma
T08D4119-2:41b-34: 'dir ni bsgrub pa bsngags pa la sogs pa la
T08D4119-2:41b-35: ser sna byed pa la yin gyi sems kyi dri
T08D4119-2:41b-36: ma la ni ma yin no //
T08D4119-2:41b-37: de ltar yang 'dir gleng gzhi las sbom dga' mos
T08D4119-2:41b-38: dge slong gzhan dag gis yon tan yang dag par
T08D4119-2:41b-39: brjod pa thos pa dang smod par byed de /
T08D4119-2:41b-40: de la dge slong ma rnams kyis 'phags ma ci'i phyir smod par byed ces smras pa dang /
T08D4119-2:41b-42: bdag ni sh'akya'i rigs su skyes pas sde snod gsum gyi chos smra bar rigs pa dang /
T08D4119-2:41b-43: grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa kho mo'i bsngags
T08D4119-2:41b-44: pa mi brjod par gzhan dag gi bsngags pa brjod
T08D4119-2:42a-0: sbom dga' mos dge slong ma gzhan dag la khyed kyis gang na @42a * //
T08D4119-2:42a-1: bsod snyoms bsod pa rnyed ces dris pa dang /
T08D4119-2:42a-2: dge slong ma rnams kyis thams cad smras pa dang /
T08D4119-2:42a-3: de nas sbom dga' mo smod cing de dag zlog par byed do //
T08D4119-2:42a-4: khyim ga ge mo zhig tu khyed cag ma 'gro shig ces bya ba'i bar dang /
T08D4119-2:42a-5: sbom dga' mos de dge slong ma'i dbyar khang byed du bcug nas /
T08D4119-2:42a-6: de na dge slong ma rnams gnas shing sa gnyis pa gzhan la sbom dga' mo gnas te /
T08D4119-2:42a-7: de rnams des bag yangs su rkang pa dag gis
T08D4119-2:42a-8: 'chag cing spyod pa'i sgra chen po dag gis grag
T08D4119-2:42a-9: par gyur nas / sbom dga' mo de rnams la
T08D4119-2:42a-10: smod cing 'di ltar rnam par 'gyur bar byed do
T08D4119-2:42a-11: par gyur nas / // rnam par 'gyur ba dag
T08D4119-2:42a-12: gis sgeg pa dang bcas pas 'chag pa de rnams
T08D4119-2:42a-14: ji ltar ba lang mo rnams 'chag par byed pa
T08D4119-2:42a-15: ltar ma bsdams pa'i sgra gang gi phyir byung bar
T08D4119-2:42a-16: gyur to // dge slong ma rnams kyis 'phags ma
T08D4119-2:42a-17: khyod gnas la ser sna byed dam zhes smras pa
T08D4119-2:42a-18: gyur to // / ci'i phyir kho mo mi byed
T08D4119-2:42a-19: bdag gis blangs shing gtsug lag khang byed du bcug
T08D4119-2:42a-20: ste chos bstan pas lce la chu bur byung byung
T08D4119-2:42a-21: gi bar du bsgrubs pa yin no //

T08D4119-2:42a-23: lag pa gnyis la chu bur bskyed pa de'i phyir
T08D4119-2:42a-25: sbom dga' mo 'di snyam du dge slong ma 'di
T08D4119-2:42a-26: rnams snga mar bsod snyoms la rab tu 'jug pas
T08D4119-2:42a-27: / kho mos rnyed pa gang la thob snyam nas /
T08D4119-2:42a-28: da thabs cung zad byas te /
T08D4119-2:42a-29: gang gis bdag kho na sngar zhugs la phyis 'di rnams 'jug go snyam nas /
T08D4119-2:42a-30: des de rnams gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa
T08D4119-2:42a-31: ster bar byed de khyed cag ni zas tsam la
T08D4119-2:42a-32: rtse gcig pa zas dang 'brel pa'i sems kyis mtshan
T08D4119-2:42a-33: mo 'da' bar byed do zhes zer zhing /
T08D4119-2:42a-34: khyed cag rnams ni mkhan mo ma yin te /
T08D4119-2:42a-35: nye gnas dang bsnyen bkur gyis shig / khyed cag
T08D4119-2:42a-36: rnams ni bcom ldan 'das la mandal dang bstod par
T08D4119-2:42a-38: gcig pu ltung byed de blangs nas snga bar bsod
T08D4119-2:42a-39: snyoms la rab tu zhugs so zhes bya ba dang
T08D4119-2:42a-40: / de rnams kyi bsams pa 'phags ma de bzhin du rigs so zhes zer te /
T08D4119-2:42a-41: de rnams 'gro bar ma brtsams pa dang /
T08D4119-2:42a-42: sbom dga' mos kyang skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na /
T08D4119-2:42b-0: bram ze @42b gzhan dag bkra shis don du gnyer
T08D4119-2:42b-1: ba yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod pas khyim nas
T08D4119-2:42b-2: byung ba dang / des de mthong nas mgo reg mthong na bkra mi shis so zhes zer te /
T08D4119-2:42b-3: bzung nas shin tu brdegs so zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T08D4119-2:42b-4: sbom dga' mo la dge slong ma rnams kyis 'phags
T08D4119-2:42b-5: mas bdag cag rnams la lung dbog par 'tshal na
T08D4119-2:42b-6: / gal te khyed kyis bdag cag la gnang ba

T08D4119-2:42b-9: des kho mo ro rgyab nas shas dugs gyis shing ces las byed du 'jug pa dang /
T08D4119-2:42b-10: de rnams byed cing bdag gi gos rnams dri ma can du gyur pas na /

T08D4119-2:42b-15: gcig pu kho mo cag la las byed du bcug
T08D4119-2:42b-16: ste gang gis kho mo cag la gnang bar mi
T08D4119-2:42b-18: kho mo ci'i phyir mi byed ces bya ba'i bar du'o //

T08D4119-2:42b-21: // / da 'di man chad ni skrod pa las gyur pa'i ltung byed gnyis bstan te /

T08D4119-2:42b-26: bya ba ste / so // bkru ba'i don du

T08D4119-2:42b-28: bya ba ste / so // / spring yig la
T08D4119-2:42b-29: sogs pa'i rnam pa gang yang rung bas zhes bya
T08D4119-2:42b-30: bya ba ste / so // / ba'i don to
T08D4119-2:42b-31: // 'dir sbom dga' mos dge slong ma snga nas
T08D4119-2:42b-33: lag pa dag gis mnan pa dang /
T08D4119-2:42b-35: 'phags ma ci'i phyir gnod pa byed /
T08D4119-2:42b-37: su la gnod pa de dag 'gro la rag go //

T08D4119-2:273a-44: brtson ldan zhal zas bdud rtsi rnams ni 'dzin mdzad de //
T08D4119-2:273a-45: 'od zer dang ldan rgyan rnams kyis smras gnas par gyur //
T08D4119-2:273a-46: nu ma gnyis kyi lcid kyis dud byas lha yi bud med rnams ni nyams dga' ba //
T08D4119-2:273a-47: lag pa padma'i ze 'bru rnams la dbul ba chags pa'i lag dar bcas //
T08D4119-2:273b-0: ro dang bcas pa'i shing rnams la ni byung ba'i bca' ba dang @273b bcas pa //
T08D4119-2:273b-1: rtag tu g-yul dor rnam par rgyal ba'i phyogs ni kha na ma tho nyid //
T08D4119-2:273b-2: ye shes las ni rab tu 'jug ba'i steng du gang gi 'grel pa brtsams pa ste //
T08D4119-2:273b-3: bye brag bshad pa rnams las shin tu rgya chen tshul ni rnam par gsal byed pa //
T08D4119-2:273b-4: thams cad du ni snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer tshogs kyis mun pa'i rab rib ltar //
T08D4119-2:273b-5: rin chen 'byung gnas mchog gi grub mtha' nga rgyal chen po rnams ni 'jig par byed //
T08D4119-2:273b-6: theg pa rgyas pas zab pa'i sangs rgyas gsung gi chu yi phung po las //
T08D4119-2:273b-7: rang byung tshul ni rnam par 'joms pa'i shes rab kyis bsrubs yang dag par //
T08D4119-2:273b-8: shin tu dri med tshul gyis rin chen rnams kyi 'od gsal 'grel pa'i dpal //
T08D4119-2:273b-9: 'gro ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rgyur gyur des ni myur du btu bar byas //
T08D4119-2:273b-10: mun pa 'joms shin tshul khrims yangs pa'i 'od zer can ni dpal ldan sngon med ri bong can //
T08D4119-2:273b-11: rtsod pa'i dus su skyes pa dri ma dang bral gang zhig grangs pa rdzogs pa legs pa'i blo //
T08D4119-2:273b-12: rtag tu mu stegs can gyi mthug pa'i mun pa las rgyal shes rab ri bong can gyi mthar //
T08D4119-2:273b-13: grags pa'i shes rab 'dzin mkhas dman pa'i tshogs 'joms sh'akya'i 'od ni gsal ldan pa //
T08D4119-2:273b-14: yang dag bstan bcos tshul gyi rab tu rgyas pa'i padma gsal bar byed cing thams cad du //
T08D4119-2:273b-15: skyes bu shin tu rnam dag grags pa'i rjes 'gro gang zhig nyi ma'i gshegs gnyen la brten pa'o /
T08D4119-2:273b-17: // / tshigs bcad stong phrag bcu bzhi ni //
T08D4119-2:273b-18: 'di yi tshad du shes bya ste //
T08D4119-2:273b-19: dpal ldan rgyal chen thams cad kyis //
T08D4119-2:273b-20: rgyal srid byed dus 'di byas so //
T08D4119-2:273b-21: 'dul ba mdo'i 'grel pa bcom brlag ma zhes bya
T08D4119-2:273b-22: ba yul bcom brlag gi 'phags pa gzhi thams cad
T08D4119-2:273b-23: yod par smra ba'i rtsod pa ba chen po rnams
T08D4119-2:273b-24: kyi khyu mchog bstan bcos du ma mdzad pa gzhung
T08D4119-2:273b-25: 'bum phrag bco brgyad la kha ton mdzad pa'i slob
T08D4119-2:273b-26: dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T08D4119-2:273b-28: // /'di ni dpal sa nyi'i gtsug lag khang chen por
T08D4119-2:273b-29: rje btsun dam pa rgyal po chen po'i yang chen
T08D4119-2:273b-30: po dbang phyug dam pa dpal tshul khrims nyi ma'i
T08D4119-2:273b-31: lha rab tu rgyas par gyur pa rnam par rgyal
T08D4119-2:273b-32: ba'i rgyal srid kyi lo la bris pa yin no
T08D4119-2:273b-33: // gang 'di 'dul ba'i sde snod stong phrag nyi
T08D4119-2:273b-34: shu rtsa lnga las lhag pa'i 'bum phrag gcig gi
T08D4119-2:274a-0: don gsal bar byed pa rang gi @274a * //
T08D4119-2:274a-1: rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba lo ts'a ba
T08D4119-2:274a-2: sh'akya'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas kyis bsgyur ba'i
T08D4119-2:274a-3: bsod nams gang des mkhan po dang slob dpon dang
T08D4119-2:274a-4: pha dang ma sngon du 'gro bar byas pa'i ma
T08D4119-2:274a-5: lus pa'i sems can gyi phung pos bla na med
T08D4119-2:274a-6: pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par gyur cig
T08D4119-2:274a-8: // / 'bum gyi tshad ldan 'dul ba'i rgya mtsho chen po
T08D4119-2:274a-9: dag / ston pas gsungs pa las ni man ngag
T08D4119-2:274a-10: tshul gyis 'dir // gzings ni yang dag thob nas bla ma'i drin gyis ni //
T08D4119-2:274a-11: gang zhig rin chen mdo rnams yang dag mdzad par gyur //
T08D4119-2:274a-12: sa gsum brnyes nas dpal ldan rgyal ba rnams kyi sras //
T08D4119-2:274a-13: yon tan 'od ces bya ba yon tan rnams kyis gtsos //
T08D4119-2:274a-14: mdo yi bshad pa bdud rtsi'i ro yis yang dag par //
T08D4119-2:274a-15: rang gis mdzad 'di 'gro ba la ni phan 'dod cing //
T08D4119-2:274a-16: dge slong pha ma la sogs 'dul ba'i snod gyur pa'i //
T08D4119-2:274a-17: 'jig rten tshim par mdzad cing grags pas kun la khyab //
T08D4119-2:274a-18: rgyal ba'i yum la legs pa'i blo mnga' 'phags pa thogs med bzhin du dri med don shes khyod //
T08D4119-2:274a-19: phyogs kyi glang po'i bsdus don 'di la yang ni mi mnyam de dang 'dra bar khyod kyis gzung //
T08D4119-2:274a-20: slob dpon chos mchog bzhin du tshang ma la mkhas khyod kyis phyi rol don grub la ster ba //
T08D4119-2:274a-21: slob dpon dbyig gnyen lta bur sems can rnams la khyod ni don gnyer la dga' mdzod ni ster //
T08D4119-2:274a-22: dpal ldan blo gros 'byung gnas zhes bya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa'i bslab 'dzin ni //
T08D4119-2:274a-23: gsol dang bzhi yi las kyi cho gas dge slong rnam dag bsnyen rdzogs mchog ni thob gyur nas //
T08D4119-2:274a-24: gzhan rnams la yang rung dbang thob nas rang gis rab tu dbyung phyir mkhan po mdzad pa ste //
T08D4119-2:274a-25: rang gi rnam bshad sgyur bar byed pa'i sbyin bdag
T08D4119-2:274a-26: de ni yun ring por ni gnas gyur cig /
T08D4119-2:274a-27: bsgyur ba'i yon bdag nyid mdzad pas //
T08D4119-2:274a-28: khyed kyis dge ba gang thob pa //
T08D4119-2:274a-29: des ni tshogs gnyis myur rdzogs nas //
T08D4119-2:274a-30: khyod nyid sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig //
T08D4119-2:274a-31: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta aa langkar de ba dang /
T08D4119-2:274a-32: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba sh'a kya'i dge slong
T08D4119-2:274a-33: tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pa gnyis kyis dpal sgye'u
T08D4119-2:274a-34: ri'i rtsa chos skor dben tsha'i gtsug lag khang du
